name: Windows-driver-docs
tagline: The official Windows Driver Kit documentation sources
body:
# Windows Driver Documentation

Welcome to the Windows driver docs repository, housing the source for the official Windows Driver Kit documentation available on [MSDN](https://msdn.microsoft.com/windows/hardware/drivers). 

## Contributing

We actively merge contributions into this repository via [pull request](https://help.github.com/articles/using-pull-requests/) into the *staging* branch (for the public repo) or the *master* branch (for the private repo). 

For more information on contributing, read our [contributions guide](CONTRIBUTING.md).

## Microsoft Code of Conduct

This project has adopted the [Microsoft Open Source Code of Conduct](https://opensource.microsoft.com/codeofconduct/). For more information see the [Code of Conduct FAQ](https://opensource.microsoft.com/codeofconduct/faq/) or contact [opencode@microsoft.com](mailto:opencode@microsoft.com) with any additional questions or comments.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
